Knowledge.name: Violet has a scar on her wrist

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, you hurt your wrist?
It's scarred all over.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why are you looking at my wrists?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Just the one.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's impure!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, you hurt your wrist?
It's scarred all over.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, that. It's just a scrape, nothing serious.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It looks fresh.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You should know, I can be very clumsy sometimes.

Instantiation.speaker: Violet
Instantiation.name: Violet is neutral to the player

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, you hurt your wrist?
It's scarred all over.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, that. I was bitten by a great tiger whilst on my African safari.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You've been to Africa?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Never. Although I've heard it's splendorous.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I see...

Rule.name: Increase trust between quest giver and player
Quest giver trusts the player more than a little bit
Default version

Instantiation.name: Get Violet to break up with James

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, please convince my daughter to break up with the stable boy. He's not good enough for her.

Rule.name: The colonel really likes the player

Instantiation.name: Get Violet to date you instead

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, you're better than that silly stable boy. Convince my daughter to date you instead.

Rule.name: The colonel really dislikes the player

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, you seem like you would be a good fit for the stableboy. Convince him to date you instead.

Rule.name: Violet and James are no longer dating
Quest completed as requested, raise trust and give item

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Mr. Gosrick, the deed is done.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: My daughter and the stable-boy are no longer together?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: There was nothing to it, sir. Their relationship was already beginning to crumble.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Splendid! Splendid news! I knew I could count on you!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Happy to lend a hand. Although I am still a bit curious; why was it so important that they be broken up today? By me?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm afraid I'm not quite ready to impart that to you, but don't think that means I don't appreciate you! You have proven yourself a most trustworthy and honorable friend. I'd like you to have this.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sir! I can't accept this.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Please! Please do! For the man who saved my daughter's class and dignity, even this is not enough.

Rule.name: Broke them up, but he asked you to woo Violet. Not completed as requested, so only raise trust a little

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Mr. Gosrick, the deed is done.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You wooed my daughter?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, no, but I convinced her to break up with James.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Did my daughter not meet your fancy? She is very beautiful.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm sorry, but she is just not my type.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I suppose you got to the heart of the matter, but I had rather hoped...

Rule.name: Broke them up, but he asked you to woo James. Not completed as requested, so only raise trust a little

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Mr. Gosrick, the deed is done.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You wooed the stable-boy?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, no, but I convinced him to break up with Violet.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Was he not good enough for you? I didn't think you were so picky.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm sorry, but he is just not my type.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I suppose you got to the heart of the matter, but I had rather hoped...

Rule.name: Violet and James are no longer dating, and Violet is dating player
Asked to break them up, but wooed daughter as well. Lower trust and buddy, colonel gain angryat

Instantiation.name: Wooed Violet in addition to breaking them up

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Mr. Gosrick, I've done what you asked! Sort of!
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sort of, wot? My daughter and the stable-boy are still together then?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well no, that's done.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: The last figments of longing still linger in Violet's heart?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't think you have to worry about that either.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Then what? Spit it out!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well I've, how shall I say it, transferred Violet's affections to another.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? Whom? Sir Bivel? Gregory Fennel? Lord Bogard? The Duke of Rouen? Whom is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I find myself quite taken with her as well, actually.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: But you...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know I'm hardly of the wealthy class, and I'm not as attractive as your daughter, but I swear I'll treat her right. Do we have your blessings?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Absolutely not! You think I would let this affront stand? You've turned my daughter into a deviant!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You said to use whatever means necessary.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: How dare you abuse my trust! Get out of my sight!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But you said we were friends!

Rule.name: Completed as requested

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Mr. Gosrick, the deed is done.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You wooed my daughter?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes, and I am quite taken with her.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Splendid! Maybe with you in the picture she will quit speaking such nonsense.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Excuse me?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wot? Nothing, nothing. Be on your way, now.

Rule.name: Asked you to break them up, you wooed James as well. Raise trust some

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Mr. Gosrick, the deed is done.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You wooed the stable-boy?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, no, my heart was drawn by another.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Was he not good enough for you? I didn't think you were so picky. Wait, what do you mean by another?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Your daughter is quite beautiful...
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What?! You?? She is far too good for you!
How dare you betray my trust this way! Get out of my sight! I'm done with you.

Rule.name: Violet and James are no longer dating, and James is dating player
Asked you to break them up, but you wood James as well. Raise trust a bit

Instantiation.name: Wooed James instead of just breaking them up

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Need text for Breaking Up + Wooing James when Colonel just wanted you to break them up
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, whatever means necessary, I suppose, but I thought you had better class than that.

Rule.name: Asked you to woo Violet, but you wooed James instead, lower trust and buddy a bit, gain angryat

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Need text for Breaking Up + Wooing James when Colonel asked you to woo his daughter
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You chose the stable boy over my daughter? WTF is wrong with you?

Rule.name: Completed as requested

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Need text for Breaking Up + Wooing James when that's what the Colonel asked you to do.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You wooed the stable-boy? Awesome job.

Rule.name: Violet and James are dating and have eloped
Asked you to break them up, but you made them elope. Lower trust and buddy a lot, colonel angryat

Instantiation.name: Made them elope instead of breaking them up

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Need text for making them elope when Colonel asked you to break them up
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You really betrayed my trust AND friendship.

Rule.name: Asked you to woo Violet, made them elope, lower trust and buddy a lot, gain angryat

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Need text for making them elope when Colonel asked you to woo his daughter
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You really are a fuck up, aren't you.

Rule.name: Asked you to woo James, made them elope, lower trust and buddy a lot, gain angry at

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Need text for making them elope when Colonel asked you to woo James.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You made them elope? That's not even remotely close to what I asked for.
